channel.title: Should we get forum avatars
channel.description:
[i][size=12pt]like i was wondering if there was a reason that we dont have forum avatars, if there is can admins/forum owner please tell us why.
if im retarted and there is a place to upload one, PLEASE TELL ME :P[/size][/i]

item.title: Should we get forum avatars
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:52, topic:333099”][quote author=Frell link=topic=429515.msg3160339#msg3160339 date=1269477732]

only ways i know of getting one are being staff, graphics master, C/C+/C++ coder, java guru, and IRC legend. for the others, Tl;dr.

I want graphics master <3

Lapras and Dragonite are my favorite Pokemon
But I have a better chance at lapras (not really though, like 2% :D)

I got it 3 years after i found my love for 3d graphics, but i’ve always liked art. 3 years meaning i was making stuff every day for 3 years just about. Except when i was grounded.
[/quote]
Damn frell. That’s some dedication their. What program do you currently use? Meta is starting to bore me :p[/quote]
Cinema 4D and 3DS max, im making the switch to max over this summer so i can save time, although i’ve learned quite a bit about it already.

Read full topic

Damn frell. That’s some dedication their. What program do you currently use? Meta is starting to bore me :p[/quote]A PM would suit this discussion better, ITT is about avatars. Here’s a list that Frell posted a while back:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Though, I’m sure you’ve seen it before.

item.title: Should we get forum avatars
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I have a dream that one day even the state of Mississippi, a state sweltering with the heat of injustice, sweltering with the heat of oppression, will be transformed into an oasis of freedom and justice.

I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.

I have a dream today!

Read full topic

item.title: Should we get forum avatars
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Kihomura:

No, same reason why we don’t have images in signatures; makes the forum look messy and horrible.

That’s pretty much it. But also it would make the page take longer to load and add another load to admins because we would have to moderate avatars.

Read full topic

item.title: Should we get forum avatars
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Nope they shouldn’t. The state of maturity at moparscape is very low and people will put inappropriate stuff as their avatars, making more work for mods to remove them.

And the regular members with them usually have them as a reward for something they’ve done, like i made the moparscape on and offline images and
MITB allowed me to have one.

or they’re good friends with an admin on irc

Read full topic
